name: scalable-chat-app
description: Chatty is a **real-time chat application** built with **React, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, and WebSockets**, featuring a **Gen Z-inspired dark UI**. Users can join chat rooms, send messages, see when others are typing, and interact with modern chat features like **emoji & attachment buttons**.

scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
